original_title: JP roles for Grama Niladhari as well
original_body_lines: Grama Niladharis/Sevakas or the Village Officers can now deputize the functions of Justice of Peace, according to an Extraordinary Gazette Notification.

“Every administrative Grama Niladhari of every Divisional Secretariat division who is in permanent and active service shall be an ex-officio Justice of the Peace for the Republic of Sri Lanka,” the notice read.
The regulations were made by the Constitutional Reforms Minister under Section 61 read with Section 45(1a) of the Judicature Act, No. 2 of 1978. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
